verses.verse: The <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%> <S%G4334>came<s%>, and <S%G3985>tempting<s%> <S%G1905>desired<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> that he would <S%G1925>shew<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

He <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, When it <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G3798>evening<s%>, ye <S%G3004>say<s%>, It will be fair <S%G2105>weather<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> is <S%G4449>red<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> in the <S%G4404>morning<s%>, It will be foul <S%G5494>weather<s%> to <S%G4594>day<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> the <S%G3772>sky<s%> is <S%G4449>red<s%> and <S%G4768>lowring<s%>. O ye <S%G5273>hypocrites<s%>, ye <S%G1097>can<s%> <S%G1252>discern<s%> the <S%G4383>face<s%> of the <S%G3772>sky<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> can <S%G1410>ye<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> discern the <S%G4592>signs<s%> of the <S%G2540>times<s%>?

A <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3428>adulterous<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> seeketh <S%G1934>after<s%> a <S%G4592>sign<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G1325>shall<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G4592>sign<s%> be <S%G1325>given<s%> unto <S%G1487>it<s%>, <S%G3361>but<s%> the <S%G4592>sign<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2495>Jonas<s%>. <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2641>left<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, and <S%G565>departed<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2064>when<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> were <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the other <S%G4008>side<s%>, they had <S%G1950>forgotten<s%> to <S%G2983>take<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Take <S%G3708>heed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4337>beware<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%>.
<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G1260>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>themselves<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, It is <S%G3754>because<s%> we have <S%G2983>taken<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

Which <S%G1161>when<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1097>perceived<s%>, he <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, O ye of little <S%G3640>faith<s%>, <S%G5101>why<s%> reason <S%G1260>ye<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> ye have <S%G2983>brought<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>?

Do <S%G3539>ye<s%> not <S%G3768>yet<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G3421>remember<s%> <S%G740>the<s%> <S%G4002>five<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> of the five <S%G4000>thousand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> how <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G2894>baskets<s%> ye took <S%G2983>up<s%>?
<S%G3761>Neither<s%> <S%G740>the<s%> <S%G2033>seven<s%> <S%G740>loaves<s%> of the four <S%G5070>thousand<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> how <S%G4214>many<s%> <S%G4711>baskets<s%> ye took <S%G2983>up<s%>?

How is it <S%G4459>that<s%> ye <S%G3539>do<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> I <S%G2036>spake<s%> it <S%G3756>not<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>, that ye should <S%G4337>beware<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%>?

<S%G5119>Then<s%> understood <S%G4920>they<s%> how <S%G3754>that<s%> he <S%G2036>bade<s%> them <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G4337>beware<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G2219>leaven<s%> of <S%G740>bread<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G1322>doctrine<s%> of the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G4523>Sadducees<s%>.

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3313>coasts<s%> of <S%G2542>Caesarea<s%> <S%G5376>Philippi<s%>, he <S%G2065>asked<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, <S%G5101>Whom<s%> <S%G3004>do<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> say <S%G3004>that<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1511>am<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G3303>Some<s%> say that thou art <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G910>Baptist<s%>: <S%G1161>some<s%>, <S%G2243>Elias<s%>; <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2087>others<s%>, <S%G2408>Jeremias<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophets<s%>.
He <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5101>whom<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G3004>that<s%> <S%G3165>I<s%> <S%G1511>am<s%>?

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>the<s%> <S%G2198>living<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3107>Blessed<s%> art <S%G1488>thou<s%>, <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G2495>Bar<s%>â€“jona: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> <S%G601>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> it unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2504>I<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> <S%G2504>also<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G3754>That<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G4073>rock<s%> I will <S%G3618>build<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G1577>church<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4439>gates<s%> of <S%G86>hell<s%> <S%G2729>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> prevail <S%G2729>against<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> I will <S%G1325>give<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%> the <S%G2807>keys<s%> of the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>: <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> <S%G1437>whatsoever<s%> thou shalt <S%G1210>bind<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>: <S%G2532%G99999>and<s%> <S%G1437>whatsoever<s%> thou shalt <S%G3089>loose<s%> <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3089>loosed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> charged <S%G1291>he<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G2036>tell<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2076>was<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ<s%>.

<S%G575>From<s%> that <S%G5119>time<s%> <S%G575>forth<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> to <S%G1166>shew<s%> unto <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, how <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G565>go<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3958>suffer<s%> many <S%G4183>things<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G4245>elders<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1122>scribes<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be <S%G615>killed<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> be raised <S%G1453>again<s%> <S%G2250>the<s%> <S%G5154>third<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%>.

<S%G2532>Then<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G4355>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and began <S%G756>to<s%> <S%G2008>rebuke<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Be it <S%G2436>far<s%> from <S%G4671>thee<s%>, <S%G2962>Lord<s%>: <S%G5124>this<s%> <S%G2071>shall<s%> <S%G3756%G99999>not<s%> <S%G2071>be<s%> unto <S%G4671>thee<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> he <S%G4762>turned<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, Get <S%G5217>thee<s%> <S%G3694>behind<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%>, <S%G4567>Satan<s%>: thou <S%G1488>art<s%> an <S%G4625>offence<s%> unto <S%G3450>me<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> thou <S%G5426>savourest<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the things that <S%G3588>be<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> those that <S%G3588>be<s%> of <S%G444>men<s%>.

<S%G5119>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3101>unto<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G3694>after<s%> <S%G3450>me<s%>, let him <S%G533>deny<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> take <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4716>cross<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G190>follow<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3739%G99999>whosoever<s%> <S%G2309>will<s%> <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> shall <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3739%G99999>whosoever<s%> will <S%G622>lose<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>life<s%> <S%G1752>for<s%> <S%G1700>my<s%> <S%G1752>sake<s%> shall <S%G2147>find<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G5623>is<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G5623>profited<s%>, <S%G1437>if<s%> he shall <S%G2770>gain<s%> <S%G2889>the<s%> <S%G3650>whole<s%> <S%G2889>world<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G2210>lose<s%> his <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%>? <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> <S%G1325>shall<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> in <S%G465>exchange<s%> <S%G5590>for<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5590>soul<s%>?

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3195>shall<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> <S%G3962>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> he shall <S%G591>reward<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4234>works<s%>.

<S%G281>Verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, There <S%G1526>be<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%>, <S%G3748>which<s%> <S%G1089>shall<s%> <S%G3756%G99999>not<s%> <S%G1089>taste<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2193%G99999>till<s%> they <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G932>kingdom<s%>.
